description: Erection of a hip to gable loft extension including rear box dormer, two front elevation roof light windows and a single storey outbuilding to be used for incidental purposes.
decision_conditions: It has not been demonstrated that the facing materials to be used on the proposed roof extension would be of a similar appearance to those used in the construction of the exterior of the existing dwellinghouse. Therefore the proposed development would fail to comply with condition B2.(a), Class B, Part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

It has not been demonstrated that the proposed shower room within the single storey detached outbuilding would fall within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Class E of Schedule 2, Part 1, Class E of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
